GSD.description:
Bluetooth: refactor malicious adv data check

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.19 by commit bcea886771c3f22a590c8c8b9139a107bd7f1e1c. For more details please see the references link.
